    • Highlights

    • Experience the stunning beauty of Kerala, from hill stations to serene beaches.
    • Explore tea gardens in Munnar, witness wildlife in Thekkady, and cruise the backwaters in Alleppey.
    • Unwind on the pristine beaches of Kovalam and visit the rich heritage sites in Trivandrum.
    • Enjoy authentic Kerala cuisine and cultural performances throughout the journey.

    Escape to Kerala - 7 Nights / 8 Days

    Day 1: Arrival in Cochin

    • Arrive in Cochin and transfer to your hotel.
    • Explore Fort Kochi, Mattancherry Palace, and the famous Chinese fishing nets.
    • Enjoy a Kathakali dance performance in the evening.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Cochin.

    Day 2: Cochin to Munnar

    • After breakfast, drive to Munnar, a picturesque hill station.
    • Visit Cheeyappara and Valara waterfalls along the way.
    • Arrive in Munnar, check in, and relax for the evening.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Munnar.

    Day 3: Munnar Sightseeing

    • Visit Eravikulam National Park, Mattupetty Dam, and Kundala Lake.
    • Explore tea plantations and enjoy tea tasting at a local tea museum.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Munnar.

    Day 4: Munnar to Thekkady

    • After breakfast, drive to Thekkady, known for Periyar Wildlife Sanctuary.
    • Check in to the hotel and take a boat ride in Periyar Lake for wildlife viewing.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Thekkady.

    Day 5: Thekkady to Alleppey

    • Drive to Alleppey, famous for its backwaters.
    • Board a houseboat and cruise along the backwaters, enjoying local sights and cuisine.
    • Overnight stay on a houseboat in Alleppey.

    Day 6: Alleppey to Kovalam

    • Drive to Kovalam, Kerala's most popular beach destination.
    • Relax on the beach or explore local shops and restaurants.
    • Overnight stay at a beachside hotel in Kovalam.

    Day 7: Kovalam and Trivandrum Sightseeing

    • Visit Padmanabhaswamy Temple, Napier Museum, and Kuthiramalika Palace in Trivandrum.
    • Return to Kovalam for a relaxed evening by the beach.
    • Overnight stay at a hotel in Kovalam.

    Day 8: Departure from Trivandrum

    • After breakfast, check out from the hotel.
    • Transfer to Trivandrum Airport or railway station for onward journey.
    • End of the Escape to Kerala tour.
